=== Higher-Order Functions Tests ===

Test 1: Map - Double each number
Result: [2, 4, 6, 8, 10]

Test 2: Filter - Get even numbers
Result: [2, 4, 6, 8]

Test 3: Reduce - Sum array
Sum: 100

Test 4: ForEach - Print each element
Total after ForEach: 6

Test 5: Map with closure
With offset 100: [101, 102, 103]

=== All Higher-Order Functions Tests Complete ===
